original_text: But the Jews in Susa did not rest until the 15th day of the month. That was because they killed their enemies on both the 13th day and the 14th day. On the 15th day they ate feasts and they were very happy.
korean_text: 수산에 사는 유다인들은 십삼일과 십사일에 모였고 십오일에 쉬며 이 날에 잔치를 베풀어 즐긴지라

sentences.original_text: But the Jews in Susa did not rest
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 수사에 있는 유대인들은 쉬지 않았다

sentences.original_text: until the 15th day of the month
on both the 13th day and the 14th day
On the 15th day they ate feasts
